headline.main: Sandoval Benched by Boston After Using Instagram During Game
headline.print_headline: Sandoval Benched by Boston After Using Instagram During Game

docs.snippet: Boston Red Sox third baseman Pablo Sandoval was benched by manager John Farrell for Thursday night's game against Atlanta after using his Instagram account during a loss to the Braves....
docs.lead_paragraph: Boston Red Sox third baseman Pablo Sandoval was benched by manager John Farrell for Thursday night's game against Atlanta after using his Instagram account during a loss to the Braves.

headline.main: UAW President Says Union Wants to Expand Healthcare Pool
headline.print_headline: UAW President Says Union Wants to Expand Healthcare Pool

docs.snippet: United Auto Workers President Dennis Williams said on Thursday he wants to enter talks with the three major U.S. automakers to pool active union and nonunion workers and UAW retirees to bargain for lower healthcare costs....
docs.lead_paragraph: United Auto Workers President Dennis Williams said on Thursday he wants to enter talks with the three major U.S. automakers to pool active union and nonunion workers and UAW retirees to bargain for lower healthcare costs.

headline.main: N. Carolina Toddler Left in Daycare Van During Record Heat
headline.print_headline: N. Carolina Toddler Left in Daycare Van During Record Heat

docs.snippet: A daycare worker in North Carolina has been fired after a mother told police that her toddler daughter was left in a preschool daycare van for several hours during record-breaking temperatures....
docs.lead_paragraph: A daycare worker in North Carolina has been fired after a mother told police that her toddler daughter was left in a preschool daycare van for several hours during record-breaking temperatures.

headline.main: Lawsuit Revived Against Half Brother of Jacqueline Kennedy
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Revived Against Half Brother of Jacqueline Kennedy

docs.lead_paragraph: The Oregon Court of Appeals revived a lawsuit filed by the man who alerted police that the half brother of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis had a collection of child pornography.

headline.main: Iowa High Court to Rule on Telemedicine Abortions Ban
headline.print_headline: Iowa High Court to Rule on Telemedicine Abortions Ban

docs.snippet: The Iowa Supreme Court is expected to rule whether a state medical board overstepped its authority by requiring doctors to be in the room when a woman receives abortion-inducing medication rather than allowing it to be administered remotely via vi...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Iowa Supreme Court is expected to rule whether a state medical board overstepped its authority by requiring doctors to be in the room when a woman receives abortion-inducing medication rather than allowing it to be administered remotely via video conferencing.

headline.main: U.S. Training for Syrian Rebels Moving Slower Than Expected: Pentagon
headline.print_headline: U.S. Training for Syrian Rebels Moving Slower Than Expected: Pentagon

docs.snippet: The U.S. effort to build a moderate Syrian opposition force that can stand up to Islamic State rebels is moving more slowly than expected due to complications vetting volunteers and bringing them out of Syria for training, the Pentagon said on Thu...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. effort to build a moderate Syrian opposition force that can stand up to Islamic State rebels is moving more slowly than expected due to complications vetting volunteers and bringing them out of Syria for training, the Pentagon said on Thursday.

headline.main: In California, Uber Driver Is Employee, Not Contractor: Agency
headline.print_headline: In California, Uber Driver Is Employee, Not Contractor: Agency

docs.snippet: A driver for Uber is an employee, not a contractor, according to a California ruling that eventually could push up costs for the smartphone-based ride hailing service and hurt the closely watched start-up's valuation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A driver for Uber is an employee, not a contractor, according to a California ruling that eventually could push up costs for the smartphone-based ride hailing service and hurt the closely watched start-up's valuation.

headline.main: Brazil Senators Say Bus Attacked on Venezuela Visit to Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Brazil Senators Say Bus Attacked on Venezuela Visit to Prisoners

docs.snippet: Brazilian senators seeking to visit jailed opposition leaders in Venezuela said their minibus was stoned and blocked, forcing them to return to the airport on Thursday. Brazil's foreign ministry condemned the incident....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian senators seeking to visit jailed opposition leaders in Venezuela said their minibus was stoned and blocked, forcing them to return to the airport on Thursday. Brazil's foreign ministry condemned the incident.

headline.main: Bangladesh Stun India in ODI Series Opener
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh Stun India in ODI Series Opener

docs.snippet: Mustafizur Rahman made a dream ODI debut as Bangladesh crushed two-time world champions India by 79 runs on Thursday in the first of three one-day internationals to underline their progress in the 50-over format....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mustafizur Rahman made a dream ODI debut as Bangladesh crushed two-time world champions India by 79 runs on Thursday in the first of three one-day internationals to underline their progress in the 50-over format.
